actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Self-Government and Governmental Reorganization Act with respect to the rate of compensation of the City Administrator.

summary.text: Amends the District of Columbia Self-Government and Governmental Reorganization Act to direct that the City Administrator be paid in accordance with the District government merit personnel system.

titles.title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Self-Government and Governmental Reorganization Act with respect to the rate of compensation of the City Administrator.
